dc_title_s: Geologic atlas of Pope County, Minnesota, C-15, Part B, Plate 7, Hydrogeology of the Buried Aquifers
dc_description_s: Maps showing the hydrolgic characteristics of buried aquifers in unconsolidated sediments overlying the bedrock and water table elevation and depth to water table in the buried aquifers, including the age of the water as determined from radioactive isotopes in the water, scale 1:100,000, Pope County.
dc_publisher_s: Minnesota Department of Natural Resources, Division of Waters
